description:
The Flash fans were certainly sorry to see Wentworth MIller’s Leonard Snartcalled away to Legends of Tomorrow,but there’s surprising news in store. Miller won’t stick with Legends of Tomorrow as a Season 2 regular, but rather split time between it and The Flash Season 3 as a Warner Bros. TV regular.《闪电侠》的粉丝们一定不愿看见饰演寒冷队长伦纳德·斯奈特的温特沃斯·米勒因出演《明日传奇》而提前离开，但将有令人惊喜的新闻出炉。米帅将不会作为《明日传奇》第二季的常驻角色，而会分出时间来以华纳兄弟一员的身份出演《闪电侠》第三季的常驻角色。

The Prison Break star was apparently always intended for a temporary Legends of Tomorrow role, now set to divide time between Season 2 and a Flash return.《越狱》的主演米帅一直以来都只是《明日传奇》的临时角色，而现在他开始在《明日传奇》第二季的拍摄间隙参演《闪电侠》第三季。

Miller’s new deal is noted as “the first contract not applicable to just one show,” something Berlantihopes eventually to extend to other characters as well.米帅的新合约是首个不局限于一部剧集的合同，伯兰蒂希望这份合约能够扩展至更多角色。
